content: # **2026-01-14 WEEKLY REPORT** ## Blog Posts * **Status**: * **2026-01-08** - [Status Network in 2025: Building a Gasless and Private Layer 2](https://status.app/blog/status-network-in-2025-building-a-gasless-and-private-layer-2) _2025 was a foundational year for Status Network\. The focus was on buil..._ * **2026-01-09** - [Devconnect, Revisited: What we shared, what we learned, what we’re building](https://status.app/blog/devconnect-revisited-what-we-shared-what-we-learned-what-were-building) _Two months after Devconnect, the conversations from that week still sh..._ * **2026-01-12** - [Building a Private, Gasless Network in Public: A 2025 Transparency Update](https://status.app/blog/building-a-private-gasless-network-in-public-a-2025-transparency-update) _When people hear ‘gasless Layer 2’, their reaction is usually one of t..._ * **Nomos**: * **2026-01-08** - [2025 Year in Review](https://blog.nomos.tech/2025-year-in-review) _The year 2025 marked a transformative period for the Logos Blockchain,..._ ## Forum Posts * **Logos**: * **2026-01-07** - Circles - [Circles Improvement Proposal #1: Roles + Snowflake Model](https://forum.logos.co/t/circles-improvement-proposal-1-roles-snowflake-model/1477/1) * **2026-01-07** - General - [Free Permanent Web Hosting Using Ethereum Call-data](https://forum.logos.co/t/free-permanent-web-hosting-using-ethereum-call-data/1476/1) * **2026-01-08** - Press Engine - [State of the Logos Network: November 2025](https://forum.logos.co/t/state-of-the-logos-network-november-2025/1480/1) ## YouTube Videos **2026-01-08** - Digital Nomadism and OPSEC **2026-01-09** - IFT Townhall - January 09, 2025 **2026-01-08** - Logos Dev Club - January 12, 2026 **2026-01-07** - Logos Circle: Online - January 6, 2026 **2026-01-13** - Logos Circle: Online - January 13, 2026 **2026-01-09** - IFT Research Call - January 7, 2026 ## Releases * **Keycard**: * **2026-01-12** keycard-shell - [v1.0.4](https://github.com/keycard-tech/keycard-shell/releases/tag/v1.0.4)
